text: Seehadaytuy (Nabii Mucammad {cagate kinnuk) elle yeemeneh yaniimil isi Rabbik baxxaqqa le sumaaqih bagul yaniy, Yallih xaquk aka sumaaqite (jibriil kinnuk) usuk numma yaceemih kah sumaaqite kataatee kee kalah tama Qhuraan duma Yalli Nabii Muusal oobise kitaabay tawraat kinniy kaal yeemeneh yan marah meqe katayyuu kee nacror kinni nummaysaa kee adduny√¢ mano kee tet bilhada gurrusa numih inna maay kinni usuk? hinna, woo maray tama weeloolat weeloysime tama Qhuraan nummaysaah kaal taniimil taamitah, toysa usun jannat culaanah, koros buttaatiy koroosittey Nabiil koboxxeeh hawisse ama Qhuraanal koroositteh, toysa keenik xagni jahannam gira kinni, toysa Nabiyow atu ama Qhuraanak agaywaagat yan num makkin, diggah usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) ku Rabbik yan cakki kinnik, kinnih immay sinaamak maggo mari kaa ma nummaysa
